meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>insect</kanji> <kanji>insect</kanji> is... you guessed it! An <vocabulary>insect</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi of the kanji. You learned this reading for 昆 when you learned the kanji, but you haven't learned the on'yomi for 虫 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

Did you know that <vocabulary>insect</vocabulary>s are <reading>Chew</reading>bacca's (ちゅう) favorite thing? He's fascinated by all types of insects, and keeps them in boxes as pets. There are a good few of them crawling around in his fur, too.
